ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: ruby masks? damn boy, where d you get the rubies? (how much do they go for?) i spent the night commissioning silver jaded and silver star rose quartz (INT)
ygData.messageBody:
ruby masks? damn boy, where'd you get the rubies? (how much do they go
for?) i spent the night commissioning silver jaded and silver star rose
quartz (INT) rings, selling em for 10pp each, sometimes 15pp.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st (or 20th, depending on if
some ass trains a cyclops at me at the aviak village in s. karana or not)
lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule


At 08:14 AM 6/9/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
>
>Well, I don't know how other jeweler' days went, but I spent the entire
>night strapped to the Qeynos gate, making jewelery, and the surprise of
>the night? Ruby masks! I would commission the work, they would buy the
>gems. I made 7 masks last night at the cost of only silver to me, and
>made approx 20plat per mask. Seems those high up characters with money
>to burn don't have a lot of stuff for the face.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
>http://www.onelist.com
>Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
>

tim borrelli
